Typealiases.html#/s:6Spritz16CodiceStati.name: CodiceStatistico
Typealiases.html#/s:6Spritz16CodiceStati.abstract: A typealias for a statistical code used to represent a country or an italian municipality.

Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html#/s:6Spr.name: placeOfBirth
Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html#/s:6Spr.abstract: The italian province or country where the user was born.

Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html#/s:6Spr.name: all
Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html#/s:6Spr.abstract: A list containing all the possibile options.

Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html.name: CodiceFiscaleFields
Structs/CodiceFiscaleFields.html.abstract: An OptionSet containing all possible fields needed to generate the Codice Fiscale

Protocols/SpritzInformationProvider.html.name: placeOfBirth
Protocols/SpritzInformationProvider.html.abstract: The italian province or country where the user was born.

Protocols/SpritzInformationProvider.html.name: SpritzInformationProvider
Protocols/SpritzInformationProvider.html.abstract: A protocol used by Spritz to generate and validate the Codice Fiscale.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC13place.name: placesOfBirth
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC13place.abstract: A tuple with two keys italian and foreign, each containing an array with all the places in italy and countries respectively.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC10gener.name: generateCF(from:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC10gener.abstract: Generates the Codice Fiscale from the given information.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.name: isValid(_:inlcude:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.abstract: Returns a Result<Bool, Spritz.ParsingError> based on the validation of the Codice Fiscale checking only for the passed fields.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.name: isValid(_:for:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.abstract: Returns a Result<Bool, Spritz.ParsingError> based on a passed Codice Fiscale and information.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.name: isValid(_:inlcude:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.abstract: Returns a Bool based on the validation of the Codice Fiscale checking only for the passed fields.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.name: isValid(_:for:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC7isVali.abstract: Returns a Bool based on a passed Codice Fiscale and information.

Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC20isPro.name: isProperlyStructured(_:)
Classes/Spritz.html#/s:6SpritzAAC20isPro.abstract: Checks if the passed Codice FIscale is properly structured regardless of info.

Classes/Spritz.html.name: Spritz
Classes/Spritz.html.abstract: The main class of the pod. It can not be instantiated, nor it should be since all methods are static.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
